search.tooManyEntriesInDatabase: We found {{ resultCount }} entries in our Database.
search.useFilter: Please use filters to reduce the number of results to a maximum of 500.

tooltips.materialDesignation: Description of the product with material short text and point version
tooltips.pcmQuantity: Quantity with which the PCM SQV in the row below is calculated
tooltips.pcmSqv:
Standard Quotation Value - calculated cost in a standardized way in the Cost Calculation Manager PCM
Difference to SQV SAP is that the PCM SQV includes calculationary interest and is calculated once in PCM
SQV SAP is calculated monthly and adjusted to changes
tooltips.budgetQuantity: Quantity that is in Budget of Controlling to be produced in {{year}}
tooltips.sqvSapLatestMonth:
Standard Quotation Value - calculated cost in a standardized way in SAP
Difference to PCM SQV is that the SQV SAP is adjusted monthly to changes and the PCM SQV is calculated once and includes calculationary interest
tooltips.gpcLatestYear: Actual cost needed to produce one part in {{year}}
tooltips.averagePrice: Group Production Cost - Net Sales in {{year}} divided by the actual produced quantity in {{year}}
tooltips.puUm: Price unit per unit of measure; standardized in the tool to 1 piece (1 ST in German)
tooltips.procurementType: 3 different cases: 1) in-house production 2) purchased part 3) raw material
tooltips.plant: 4-digit number of Plant for which the SQV SAP is calculated; usually the plant where the part is produced or bought
tooltips.salesOrganization: 4-digit number related to Schaeffler internal sales organizations
tooltips.actualQuantity: Actual produced quantity of the part regarding SOCO (Kind of a turnover report)
tooltips.netSales: Summed up Net Sales in {{year}} in EUR for all customers
tooltips.budgetQuantitySoco: Quantity that is in Budget of Controlling to be produced in {{year}}
tooltips.plannedQuantity: Quantity that is planned to be produced and given by the SOCO report
tooltips.projectName: Name of the project which the part is related to
tooltips.productDescription: In contrast to the technical and Schaeffler internal Material Designation (Row 2) this is the description of the product in common language like 'Bearing' or 'Housing'
tooltips.materialShortDescription: Schaeffler internal short description: a combination of the type of product itself like 'GEH' for a housing (Geh√§use in German) and the part in which it is assemblied like 'WMM' for thermal management modul
tooltips.inquiryType: Type of the RFQ; example: 6 for new calculation, 7 for reapeted calculation
tooltips.customer: The Customer to which we sell this part
tooltips.rfq: Identity Number for the RFQ process (from Construction to Sales)
tooltips.quotationNumber: Schaeffler internal identity number for a quotation
tooltips.toolingCost: Tooling cost of the calculation in PCM
tooltips.pcmCalculationDate: Date at which the calculation of the PCM SQV was finished
tooltips.saleableItem: Gives information if a part is ready for sale or if it is just a subpart
tooltips.gpcDate: Date at which the GPC {{year}} was fixed
tooltips.sqvDate: Date at which the calculation of the SQV SAP year was finished
tooltips.specialProcurement: Lot more explicit value then the upper 'Procurement Type'; example: F0 = external procurement
tooltips.supplier: The supplier of the part if it is a purchased part

menu.resetAll: Reset table to its default settings
